name: Lisa M.
text: Great shows for a fun night out in Auburn. The comedians are really great and ticket prices are are great value for some good comedians. The venue itself is very big and you have a good view from any table because the stage is pretty big. Great food options while watching the show but the drinks weren't my fave personally but you can't go wrong with a couple beers. Definitely worth a try!!

resp.text:
Thank you for visiting Crown of Comedy. We greatly appreciate our customers and their feedback.
Thanks again for your patronage.

name: Chad Owens
text: Great experience.  Bill Bellamy was hilarious.  I think with more social media and radio advertising,  this place could be a hot spot as there is not another comedy club bringing in top comedians in the area.

resp.text: Thank you. We are happy that you enjoyed your time spent at Crown of Comedy. We enjoy bringing the best of talent to the Lee County area. We are continuously strategizing to get more publicity. Thanks again and we appreciate your patronage.

name: Sarlando Billingslea
text: MY WIFE AND I HAS VISITED VENUE ON A FEW OCCASIONS, WENT TO GO SEE BILL BELAMY HE WAS GREAT, BUT IM NOT SURE IF STAFF WAS HAVING A BAD NIGHT OR NOT BUT THERE WAS NO SECURITY AT THE DOOR TO CHECK PEOPLE LIKE BEFORE...NO SOCIAL DISTANCING WITH SEATING ARRANGEMENTS...THE WINGS WE ORDERED CAME OUT SUPER LATE..THEY WAS UNDERCOOKED AND COLD..THE FRIED SHRIMPS WAS HARD AS A BRICK..DRINKS WAS NOT ON POINT THIS TIME..ALSO THE VIP SECTION COST MORE BUT YOU REALLY GET THE SAME VIEW WITH REGULAR SEATING..WE LIKE TGE VENUE AND LOCATION BUT THIS MAY HAVE BEEN A DEAL BREAKER FOR US.

resp.text:
Mr Billingslea,
We appreciate the patronage of you and your wife. I would like to apologize for such an unsatisfying experience. Obviously, this was not a typical evening.  I will say that labor shortage is real. However, there is no excuse for unsatisfactory food etc.  Furthermore, at times of large events the wait time can and will be longer than when services at a smaller performance. All orders are completed in the order they were submitted.  In reference to seating we aim to have all seats are placed for a reasonable view of the stage.  VIP allows an even closer view of the stage. Since there is still COVID measures in place seats are spaced apart.  Whether or not VIP seats are offered are controlled by contract.
We hope that we are able to earn your attendance again.
Thank you

name: LaConnie W
text: Enjoyed the comedy show tonight! Bathrooms clean. Good customer service.

resp.text: Thank you for your comments. E we are excited that you had an enjoyable experience. Thank you for your patronage.

name: brandy montoya
text: Awesome, intimate, comedy club...super friendly staff, affordable, great food & drinks, vibing atmosphere, great comedians, wonderful time ❤

resp.text: We’re super excited that you enjoyed your time at the Crown of Comedy. We look forward to seeing you again and appreciate your patronage.

name: Mark Peters
text: What a great time! Will come back every chance I get!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. We are pleased that you enjoyed your visit. We look forward to seeing you again.

name: Alesha Yawn
text: There was only 1 waitress, it took 20 minutes to get our first drink, the bartender said the waitress had to take our order, drinks were as expected, ordered cheese sticks....they were as expected except only 4, ordered fries, it was like a small from steak and shake, 3 beers, 3 drinks and the few bites of food was $64, not good,  I went hungry because my expectations were higher. They could do so much better than they’re doing now, more help, better quality of food and more options would of made the experience way better.

resp.text: Thank you for reviewing your visit to the Crown of Comedy. Labor shortage is real; however, e will continue to strive to make things better.  We are expecting to expand the menu in the future. Thank you your patronage is appreciated.

name: Robert Burns
text: Nice venue. Open area

resp.text: Thank you for your patronage.

name: S. Cheeks
text: Well upon arrival we had to stand in this not so socially distanced line( we were dang near heel to heel)! Once on the inside we were told that someone was sitting at our table and can we sit elsewhere. I answered them no because we purchased 6 VIP tickets and I wasn't gonna sit anywhere else unless they provided us with a refund for the extra we paid for "vip", which that night was clearly just a word to get extra money. When we finally got our table(which had two other people we did not know) we began to order. After waiting about an hour they came and told us they were out of chicken and a couple more food items. At this point I'm over it so asked them to just cancel the order. Let me tell you if it wasn't for the comedians I would have definitely fought for a refund! The comedians were awesome and I would love to see all 3 of them again! ELSEWHERE!!!!

name: Patrick Strickland
text: Worst waiting service. Then they automatically add gratuity, send a text receipt to yourself. So don’t tip extra.

resp.text: We appreciate you commenting on your visit. The fee you were charged covers the credit usage. and does not go towards the tip for the service you are provided by your server and is usually a minimal amount.  We will continue to work toward offering excellent service. Thank you

name: Nancy Fort
text: Need to improve on the bar and food but every thing else  was just fine lots of fun.

name: Santo Coleman
text:
The atmosphere was very laid back..I felt safe so was able to enjoy myself. They sanitize your hands at the door (lol) but I appreciated that.  The food was ok just need to get better communication between cook and waiter. I will go back again.
No Doubt

resp.text: Thank you for your visit to Crown of Comedy.  Safety and enjoyment is very important to us. So, we are grateful that you were able to enjoy your evening with us.  Communication is very important with any establishment and we will definitely strive for improvement. Hope to see you again soon.

name: Bri
text: Waiter kept messing up orders for food and drinks. Quality of food is poor for it to be a two item minimum. I would get food from here if it was not a requirement. They should consider changing entry price to offset for the food & long waits to get it.

resp.text: We appreciate you coming out and apologize our service was not up to par for you. We would like to make sure that the time you spend here is more enjoyable. If there is anything we can do please let us know. crownofcomedy.com

name: Zenobia Bey
text: Great club and ambiance!   Love the comedians...great job Chris!  Great management and staff!!!   EVERYONE, if you’re ever in Alabama or Georgia, stop by this comedy club. The food is so good.

resp.text: The Crown of Comedy appreciate you and the awesome comments you have shared.  We will continue to hold ourselves to the highest standards. We look forward to your future visits.

name: shelia scott
text: Customer service was great bartender was awesome the security was on point about safety with mask if you didn't have one on couldn't get in if you didn't have one they had one available food was delicious

resp.text: Thank you for your wonderful compliments. We are happy that we could be apart of your enjoyment and would love to have you return soon.

name: Nickie Martin
text: Good vibes with good people. The owners are very friendly and down to earth. Great atmosphere with funny comedians.

resp.text: We appreciate your wonderful comments on the Crown of Comedy.  Enjoyed having you and hope to see you again soon.

name: Melissa Echols
text:
Love The Place and Comedy
Great Job Chris and Fagel
Can't Wait to have Mt Party there💃🏿😃🎂

resp.text: Thank you, we love our customers.

name: Georgiana Hatcher
text: Great place to have a fun night out without having to go too far from home (Auburn/Opelika, Phenix City and surrounding areas). They did a great job spacing out the tables and following the COVID guidelines. The only reason I didn't rate 5 stars is that the food we ordered (wings and fries) were waaaay overpriced and very skimpy in portions. Not even enough to consider a Bar Food serving. The drinks were OK. First round not strong enough,  second round too strong.  Oh well. We did have fun though and thats what we came for.

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback and that you had an enjoyable evening.  We would be happy to have you return to improved services. Thank you

name: E Dolow
text: Had a great time T TO THE MFING K one of my best birthdays facts

resp.text: Thank you for spending your special day with us. We are pleases that you had a fabulous day. We look forward to  seeing you soon.

name: Michelle Helms
text: This is a low rent operation, with terrible comedians and a concession stand type food service.... Won't be around long...

resp.text: Thank you for your review.

name: Cameron
text: Nice place. Had some funny comedians come in with Desi Banks headlining the show. Definitely worth checking out.

resp.text:
Thanks Cameron for coming out and enjoying a great show.
Please follow us on our social media for the latest updates.  We post all our events on our social media outlets.

name: Blkboard With Bee
text: Good, covid had us spread out and the atmosphere was nice.

resp.text: Your patronage is greatly appreciated.  Safety is a high priority especially in these trying times.  We will continue to do our part.  We hope you visit again soon.

name: Jessica Tolbert
text: The food is good! Customer service on point! Nice clean environment!

resp.text: The Crown of Comedy staff appreciate you and such an amazing review. Thank you!

name: Tomekia Rush
text: Went last night to celebrate my birthday and it was grand. Warm atmosphere, good drinks, and laughed so hard I'm sore! Looking forward to going back!

resp.text: Thank you for spending your special day with us at Crown of Comedy. We are astatic that you had a fantastic time. come again soon and Happy Birthday!

name: Clarence Ervin
text: Good food and clean atmosphere plus great comedians

resp.text: Thank you for your wonderful comments and spending time at the Crown of Comedy. Hope to have you back soon for plenty of laughs.

name: jennifer owens
text: Very nice setup

resp.text: Thank you for your review. It’s greatly appreciated. Thank you

name: STREET PROPHET 2018
text: Had a great time the staff was nice the place looked really nice comedians were funny great vibe.

resp.text:
We are happy that you enjoyed your time at the Crown of Comedy.
Your patronage is appreciated.

name: Chu Meen
text: Had potential. Really really disappointed... hopeful for the future though.

resp.text: Hello Chu,  Thanks for you for your remarks.  However, I would like to know more about your personal experience so, that we can improve upon any future experiences.  Thank you

name: Tanya Frazier
text: Fun fun

name: matt baker
text: Very funny comedians. Great atmosphere.

resp.text: Your comments are important to us and we appreciate you. we will keep bringing the laughs.

name: Eunice Torbert
text: Great atmosphere!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Torbert, hope to see you soon.

name: Chris McCullough
text: Great local spot for comedy

resp.text: Thanks for spending time at Crown of Comedy. We appreciate you and hope that you come again soon.

name: Barbara Sims
text: 👍👍👍👍👍 fun fun fun👍👍👍👍

resp.text:
Thank you Mrs. Sims.  We hope to see you soon.
Thanks for the enthusiastic review!

name: breanna caldwell
text: Went this past weekend for a drag show with friends. The bartenders were not terrible, but the system they use to get drinks out at volume was really bad. I had my drink taken twice. The kitchen is also extremely slow (had friends wait over 30 minutes for nachos and they were frigid when they came out.)  This location has also become well known for this .

name: Aaron the Nomad
text: Blank is simply a cozy coffee shop that has great vibes. It is the perfect place to get a Quick coffee or just sit and do some reading. The environment is calm, peaceful, and always has some classic tunes playing.

name: Spencer Williams
text: Loved it! I was visiting from out of town and needed a place to chill. The two staff I met were super friendly and cool, they let us play board games while we hung out. Food options are limited to muffins, but they have a decent drink selection. Small comic and record selection, but a really awesome place.

resp.text: Out of towners are our favorites. You guys get it! We get you, too.

name: Andrea Lindholm
text: Keishun is wonderful and makes an excellent cup of coffee! Love it.

name: Jay B
text: Interesting collection of things being sold in the shop. Nice little place. I think a weekly group was there playing d&d at the only table in the shop. We ordered our drinks and left.

name: Chris West
text: I love the shop. Totally cool retro look. Love the patio area out back. The guys that run the store are great to talk to and know what they are talking about when it comes to comics and anything else they sell. They are super nice guys.

name: Timothy Green
text:
Came in for a coffee. Server who was going to prepare my drink wiped his nose audibly across his open palm while waiting at the register for my order. Gross. Hard pass.

Update: Check out the Owner's response to this review. Just lovely. I never ordered btw, just excused myself politely and left. Find coffee elsewhere mates! Ye be warned.

resp.text: I prefer to give people an OPPORTUNITY to wash their hands before PREPARING my beverage. Otherwise my daily triggering isn't as fair as the safe place Im constantly demanding.  Those computer screens, along with cash and cards are much grosser that you'd think. Washing hands before TAKING the order just creates the need to wash them again. We wash hands 100% of the time before making ANY beverages. ALWAYS HAVE AND ALWAYS WILL. But yeah, that's gross, and probably embarrassing to the guy attempting to take your order. Downright deplorable. You know that feeling right?  We've all been there and it ALWAYS happens at the worst possible time.  What matters though, really, is the recovery. I hate that you had to leave so abruptly though, as you missed the part where he washed his hands before preparing the drink you ordered. It was good too. I know because I drank it. We love you either way. Even when we don't meet your expectations. We will put your feedback to good use and make it a learning experience.  It is our mission to look to the past and improve the future!!

name: Scot McKinney
text: Super customer service, great coffee, awesome selection of records and comics. A great place to shop and hangout, plus the patio is sweet!

name: N Flippo
text: If the city of Florence was a store, this would be it... Great coffee and drinks (try the coffee milkshake), a varied collection of comics as well they are willing to order for you if they don't have something, and vinyl records from vintage to new. Definitely stop by to grab a drink and browse or sit on the back patio!

resp.text: Word is bond

name: Will Mitchell (Captain Will)
text: I may visit others, but this is MY comic shop.  It's a small place because they've just got started, but the folks are great, and so is the coffee.  There's lots of vinyl records, if you're into that sort of thing.  My wife and I stop in at least once a week, and they're making comic collectors out of the both of us!

name: Tiffany Kilburn
text: Absolutely amazing caramel macchiato, (not overly sweet like Starbucks) Patrick was very friendly and informative. Lovely Patio to just chill while enjoying your coffee. Will definitely be a added delight to my normal routine.

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words Tiffany!

name: Toni Serpa
text: Not a lot of anything it states in its name, but more than you'll find anywhere else around for hours. Record selection is minimal, comic selection is mostly newer items, and coffee wasn't half bad!

resp.text: Love It!!! Not half bad.

name: Ashley Harris
text: Great coffee with lots of flavor! Nice to see another local coffee shop. Plus there's plenty to look at, books and board games for hanging out, and you can do your music/comic shopping all in one stop!

name: Chicknwings
text: I've been coming here for over a month now, and absolutely love the environment and variety they offer.

resp.text: Thank you Chicknwings. We work hard to provide a unique environment and experience. Also, we really love chicken wings. So by default, we really love you!

name: Spencer Lane
text: Love this little shop. Staff are always welcoming and talkative. Vinyls, comic books, and coffee. Nothing bad about it.

name: Penny Queen
text: Good music, nice people, very quiet and peaceful.

resp.text: The BEST music! We try as much as we can to specialize in local, regional, and projects tied to the Shoals area. Also harder to find, exclusive, limited edition records, along with lots of under the radar stuff.  Thanks for your support!

name: Todd Beene
text: Fantastic locally owned comic, music, and coffee spot. The backyard is a crucial hang. Get some coffee, buy something, and spend some time out back for a great day.

name: ubermonkeyking
text: This is the best comic shop we have in this area. Guys are great and love their smoothies.

name: Andrew Lewis
text: Great selection of coffee, comics, and music including vinyl.  Nice patio to relax at.  Support your local record store!

name: Max Tew
text: Great coffee, great music, great staff. If you're looking for a place to work quietly, to talk to a stranger, or to just sit in a cozy room and enjoy a nice cup of coffee, this is the place.

name: Philip Gambrell
text: They have an amazing selection of records, books, tapes, comics, and CDs. Their coffee and smoothies are amazing, and the people are amazingly nice.

resp.text: Thank you, again and again.

name: QuaLude Cage
text: As always Great time with some awesome comics and sweet surrounding

name: Ray Martinez
text: Good comics selection. Fair prices. Nice clean store.

name: Callie White
text: Friendly employees, all very knowledgeable about music and comics. This is where I always go for new music and comic book releases.

name: Tim Elam
text: Great place to grab a cup of coffee and shop for a new comic book or vinyl record. Nice selection of books, music, and accessories.

name: June Howard Barr
text: Such a neat place. Coffee is probably my favorite in florence. The staff is so nice and the selection of records is great!

name: Steve Patterson
text: Super place to enjoy a great cup of coffee and shop for vantage records, t shirts and comic books.

name: Beautiful Noise Vinyl And Gaming Clips
text: This place is great and the owner is very friendly and knowledgeable about his products if you're in the Florence area this is your go to stop for harder to find records especially if you're into indie music

name: Michael Smith
text: Love it!

name: Jared Wallin
text: Cool little comic shop / record store / coffee bar all in one.

name: Pokeypuppy 105
text: Cleanliness and service isn't the best, but it is a neat experience for someone into comics

resp.text: Ouch. We've maintained a 99% Health Rating since day one.  Both owners have over 30 years combined in service industry management.  I'm curious if you ever gave us an opportunity to resolve your service issue before sharing it with the world?  Things happen and when they do we ALWAYS go above and beyond to make it right. Thank you for your feedback. We will continue to do our best!

name: Will Burhans
text: Nice store, great variety of drinks. Nice atmosphere.

name: Yolande Webster (Kabiu)
text: Nice comic book store.  Lots of selection.

resp.text: Thanks so much Yolande.  As a growth opportunity, how could we have earned that extra 🌟?

name: Jason Sassin
text: Great store with great owner and employees. Always a pleasure.

name: Brian Dunaway
text: Really cool place. Great selection and great staff.

name: John Tipler
text: I think they stopped carrying comics. Maybe they were going out of business? 🤔 Maybe.

name: Jeremy Woods
text: Great coffee. Great record selection. Great vibe.

name: Leslie Brown
text: Quaint local place! Vinyl and comic book junkies should totally check it out!

name: Lisa Evans The Fam
text: Great atmosphere , and very polite and respectful people working here.

resp.text: Lisa, we appreciate your kind words and value your business!!  For exclusive deals available only to regular customers, sign up for our newsletters through the "contact" page of our website @ www.blankcoffeecomicsrecords.com

name: Scott Norris
text: Perfect service and fun atmosphere

resp.text: That's the goal, at least. Must've caught us on a good day.

name: Joseph Brown
text: A cool little place to get your music and coffee

name: DC Roman
text: Coffe is pricey, but its good.

resp.text: We're glad you enjoyed the coffee. We try hard to keep our prices competitive, as they are the same, or lower, than the other local options. Unfortunately, artisan coffees are just plain expensive.  Next time ask about our loyalty program, where every 7th drink is free. Thank you for stopping in.

name: Pruitt Holcombe
text: Good coffee, good smoothies, great comics and great staff!

name: Kim Santos
text: Excellent Coffee. Relaxed atmosphere.

resp.text: Thank you for your business!

name: Cody H
text: Really awesome place with great vibes.

name: Jeremy Cravens
text: Love this place!

name: gamerguyAJ
text: Very cool place

name: Brian Schweighardt
text: Great place for vinyl comics and coffee.

resp.text: We appreciate your business!

name: Dylan Hodges
text: The people there were so nice

resp.text: Glad to know we're keeping it together, at least during hours of operation. We are a mess IRL.

name: C M Hughes
text: Great little comic book store

resp.text: Who you calling little?!?! But seriously; little store, big heart, and mediocre work ethic.

name: Cody Haithcock
text: Great place will be there again

name: Dustin Coan
text: Great little comic book and record store!

name: Hunter Parrish
text: Great shop, owners are super nice

resp.text: We think you're super nice too! Thanks.

name: Joey Turnage
text: Great shop with great people!

resp.text: Thank you, but as people we are seriously flawed. Every day we remain open is a miracle because those popular stereotypes about comic nerds and music snobs couldn't be more true. What we do have, however, are great customers.

name: Mary Cook
text: Very trendy, cute shop, great selection of comics

name: Brian Cameron
text: Good comic and record collection.

resp.text: Brian, thanks for the props! Better to respond late than never, right? We add dozens of rare and highly collectible records every week. For exclusive dscounts through our customer newsletter, contact us at www.blankccr.com

name: Kyle Jackson
text: K I yuug

name: mike wallace
text: Comic books, used albums, coffee and live music. what more could you want
